#### Rule `patterns`
author = "unknown"

description = "some description"

#### Strings
`$regex1 = /md5: [0-9a-fA-F]{32}/`

`$regex2 = /bar./s`

`$hex = { E2 34 ?? C8 A? FB }`

`$wide = "wide" wide`

`$nocase = "nocase" nocase`

`$wide_and_ascii = "wide and ascii" wide ascii`

`$xor = "xor" xor`

`$base = "base64" base64`

#### Condition
```
$regex1 and $regex2 and $hex and $wide and $nocase and $wide_and_ascii and $xor and $base
```
